name: Wisp and Dark
description:
Wisp And Dark GAMEPLAY

An Exploration game where player needs Reach from the Start point to End  ,which his harder than you think. 

Its An Obstacle Based ,Single Player Game play .

Team Member

Rishabh Gurung  

Instagram : R3habh.Gurung

FaceBook : llGrimReaprll

Linkedin : Rishabh Gurung

Controls :-

 1. W/A/S/D - Move Player.

 2. Space Bar - Jump.

 3. Tab - Wide Mode  (Your Camera Zoom out).

 4. F - Flash Light (Only Works In Far Mode)

Game Play Mechanics:-

1. Press "Tab" to zoom out your camera that is Wide mode.

2. Press "Tab" to zoom out your camera and "F" turn on flash light.

3. Battery Consumption -

3.1 Far Mode - 1x battery

 3.2 Far Mode and Flash Light - 1.5x Battery

4.  25% Battery Restores every time you die and Re-spawn .
